abstract: A number of big banks have successfully bundled and sold new securities backed by loans on office and retail properties, which has bolstered the securitization market.
snippet: A number of big banks have successfully bundled and sold new securities backed by loans on office and retail properties, which has bolstered the securitization market.
lead_paragraph: A crucial part of the securitization market — the Wall Street credit machine that helped set off the financial crisis — is kicking back into gear.

headline.main: Commercial Real Estate Breathes Life Into a Moribund Market

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (2010)
